articles.author: Loukia Papadopoulos
articles.title: A brain scientist and a philosopher have resolved a 25-year-old wager on consciousness - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: A 25-year-old wager on the source of consciousness between German-American computational neuroscientist Christof Koch and Australian philosopher and cognitive scientist David Chalmers has come to a close.
articles.content:
Indeed, consciousness was a whole other issue that Chalmers famously divided into "easy problems" and "hard problems".
Examples of easy problems are straight-forward to define such as integrating in… [+819 chars]

articles.title: Dupilumab decreases exacerbation rate, improves lung function in COPD type 2 inflammation - Healio
articles.description: WASHINGTON — At 52 weeks, adults with moderate/severe COPD and type 2 inflammation receiving dupilumab had a lower exacerbation rate and better lung function, according to an American Thoracic Society International Conference presentation.“Dupilum…
